primaryTopic.creator: http://editor.vocabs.ands.org.au/user/Natalia-Atkins
primaryTopic.dcSource: Australian Ocean Data Network Organisation Register
primaryTopic.definition: The Department of Mines and Petroleum (DMP) is the State’s lead agency in attracting private investment in resources exploration and development through the provision of geoscientific information on minerals and energy resources, and management of an equitable and secure titles systems for the mining, petroleum and geothermal industries.
primaryTopic.isReplacedBy: Department of Mines, Industry Regulation and Safety (DMIRS), Western Australian Government

prefLabel._value: Department of Mines and Petroleum (DMP), Western Australian Government

primaryTopic.replaces: Department of Industry and Resources (DOIR), Western Australian Government
primaryTopic.scopeNote: Organisation no longer exists. Replaced by http://vocab.aodn.org.au/def/organisation/entity/627. Replaces http://vocab.aodn.org.au/def/organisation/entity/74
